channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Boyfriends of Christmas Past
channel.desc: As Christmas approaches, Lauren is visited by the ghosts of four ex-boyfriends. She must learn to open her heart or risk losing her best friend, Nate.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Christmas Intern
channel.desc: Newly retired Cecelia visits her daughter, Alexis, who owns an online gift-giving business and becomes an intern. Together, they learn the meaning of Christmas, one gift at a time.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Santa Summit
channel.desc: During her hometown's annual Santa Summit, in which revellers dress up as Father Christmas, Jordin meets the man of her dreams, before he is whisked away by a sea of Santas.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Ghosts Of Christmas Always
channel.desc: Katherine is a Ghost of Christmas Present and she must help one soul, Peter, rediscover his Christmas spirit. But this year has something unusual in store.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sugarplummed
channel.desc: When Emily wishes for a perfect Christmas like the ones found in the popular Sugarplum movies, she's shocked when Sugarplum herself appears to help her fulfil it.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Checkin' It Twice
channel.desc: A hockey player falls for a real estate agent when he's traded to her hometown and moves into the cottage in her hockey-loving family's backyard.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Biltmore Christmas
channel.desc: A magical hourglass sends modern-day screenwriter Lucy Hardgrove back in time to 1946.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Santa Tell Me
channel.desc: When Olivia finds a letter from Santa promising she'll meet the love of her life by Christmas Eve - and that his name will be Nick - she's stunned by three potential suitors.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Gift Of Peace
channel.desc: After tragedy strikes, artist Traci starts to rebuild with the help of a brilliant grief support group. Heartwarming Christmas movie.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas CEO
channel.desc: The CEO of a small toy company gets a once in a lifetime offer to merge with a huge toy company, but needs her estranged ex-business partner's signature to seal the deal.
